title: smoothie
author: smoothie
created_time: March 01, 2023, 09:01:18 AMLast edit: March 05, 2023, 06:44:19 AM by smoothie
content: Donation Auction #4 For Cold Key VictimsRead very carefully before bidding._________________________________________________________________________________________________________1) ONE Alpen Coin Vreneli 2.0 Brilliant serial A034 loaded with 0.001 BTC (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)2) ONE Moonbits 2018 alloy/silver finish 1k bits (Loaded 0.001B) X1 (Donated by QuakerBull)3) Citadel Magazines #2 to #10 (Donated by NovemberMan)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________4) ONE 2019 1/4 Troy oz silver Bitcoin Penny 2019 w/ COA and bag (Donated by Mbitr)5) 1988 Fleer Reggie Miller rookie, 1996 Topps Allen Iverson rookie, 2003 Topps Dwayne Wade rookie graded psa 8 cards (Donated by Wheelz1200)6) ONE TGBEX 1 BTC denomination silver coin (unloaded/without keys) (Donated by TGBEX)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________7) .8 ) SEVEN varying crypto related Magazines (Donated by aoluain)9) A VERY SPECIAL COIN (1 of 2 coins ever with this unique back) ~ You will know why it is special because of what is on the back of this coin if you were paying attention. No hologram, no key, just awesomeness (Donated by Smoothie)Starting Bid for lots 1 thru 8: 0.00 BTCStarting Bid for lot 9: 0.01337 BTC <=========== note starting bid.** If no bids for this item, I will keep it for now with it’s sister coin.Minimum Bid increment for all lots is 0.0001END TIME:  March 5th, 2023  6:00PM ESTPayment is due within 24 hours of auction ending.SNIPING: Any bid made in the last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction an additional 5 minutes PER LOT.If no new bid is made within the 5 minute extension the auction will end, if a bid does come within that 5 minute period, the auction extends 5 minutes from the time that last bid was made.PAYMENT: Bitcoin See PGP bitcoin address from MinerJones belowShipping is based on location and preference. Please contact minerjones if you win an auction lot.Regarding payment confirmation please also contact MJ.-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA512February 1 2023 minerjones using address bc1qw5v9xtsasvrecnypx95gmew6ptzzy3fprr7gy9 to accept proceeds from the Coldkey victim auctions-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----Version: Keybase OpenPGP v2.1.13Comment: https://keybase.-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: lot 7 was already auctioned off in a prior auction @smoothie https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439649.0was lot 9 in the above first auction - and they have already been sent out.as was lot 6 - unless you have more than one of them.

comments.body: I am in possession of Lot 1 and Lot 3 currentlyGood luck to the bidders!!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on March 01, 2023, 01:56:09 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 01, 2023, 01:19:41 PMlot 7 was already auctioned off in a prior auction @smoothie https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439649.0was lot 9 in the above first auction - and they have already been sent out.as was lot 6 - unless you have more than one of them.Lot 9 and the coin in the first auction are 2 different Lealana coins- denom, size, and finish.I am not talking about lot 9 in this one --- lot 7 in this one was auctioned off as lot 9 in the first donation auction.and lot 6 in this one was lot 8 in the first donation auction.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 01, 2023, 04:05:19 PMQuote from: 2stout on March 01, 2023, 01:56:09 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 01, 2023, 01:19:41 PMlot 7 was already auctioned off in a prior auction @smoothie https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439649.0was lot 9 in the above first auction - and they have already been sent out.as was lot 6 - unless you have more than one of them.Lot 9 and the coin in the first auction are 2 different Lealana coins- denom, size, and finish.I am not talking about lot 9 in this one --- lot 7 in this one was auctioned off as lot 9 in the first donation auction.and lot 6 in this one was lot 8 in the first donation auction.Thx for clarifying!

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 01, 2023, 01:19:41 PMlot 7 was already auctioned off in a prior auction @smoothie https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439649.0was lot 9 in the above first auction - and they have already been sent out.as was lot 6 - unless you have more than one of them.Ahh gotcha!Lot removed.Lot 6 was in fact the 1 BTC coin denomination that TGBEX donated.He donated two coins (1 BTC and a 2 BTC) but he only had a picture of the 1 BTC coin.Hence duplicate images.
